snippet: Petty, who won his 200th and final race on July 4, 1984, has transitioned to a role as the owner of Richard Petty Motorsports, where winning has remained his focus....
abstract: Brad Keselowski wins Coke Zero 400 auto race at historic Daytona International Speedway.
lead_paragraph: Petty, who won his 200th and final race on July 4, 1984, has transitioned to a role as the owner of Richard Petty Motorsports, where winning has remained his focus.

headline.main: At 79, Richard Petty, a Bastion of Nascar, Sticks to What He Knows
headline.print_headline: At 79, Petty Sticks to What He Knows
